description: The ListWorkersWithQualificationType operation returns all of the Workers that have been associated with a given Qualification type.

parameters.name: QualificationTypeId
parameters.description: The ID of the Qualification type of the Qualifications to return.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the previous response was incomplete (because there is more data to retrieve), Amazon Mechanical Turk returns a pagination token in the response. You can use this pagination token to retrieve the next set of results.

nested_items.name: NumResults
nested_items.description: The number of Qualifications on this page in the filtered results list, equivalent to the number of Qualifications being returned by this call.

nested_items.name: Qualifications
nested_items.description: The list of Qualification elements returned by this call.

nested_items.name: QualificationTypeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Qualification type for the Qualification.

nested_items.name: WorkerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Worker who possesses the Qualification.

nested_items.name: GrantTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the Qualification was granted to the Worker. If the Worker's Qualification was revoked, and then re-granted based on a new Qualification request, GrantTime is the date and time of the last call to the AcceptQualificationRequest operation.

nested_items.name: IntegerValue
nested_items.description: The value (score) of the Qualification, if the Qualification has an integer value.

nested_items.name: LocaleValue
nested_items.description: The Locale data structure represents a geographical region or location.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: The country of the locale. Must be a valid ISO 3166 country code. For example, the code US refers to the United States of America.

nested_items.name: Subdivision
nested_items.description: The state or subdivision of the locale. A valid ISO 3166-2 subdivision code. For example, the code WA refers to the state of Washington.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the Qualification. Valid values are Granted | Revoked.
